name: PatchWord (itch)
description:
NOTE:  This is an early access build & has had functions & buttons disabled from the app project to enable wider user testing of core game play on pc.  This version is for PC use only.

Making words using letters of the same colour from anywhere on the board, you attempt to convert the board to all one colour.  At the start of each game board the central letter is neutral & can be used in words of either colour.  Once you have made a word click the word box to submit it.  Invalid words clear the word box, valid words clear the word box, score points based on word length, & change the colour of the letter tiles used to the unused colour.
Letters can be reused in words to swap them between colours.
Words must be 3+ letters long, & each word can only be used once per game (a game consists of multiple game boards).

Draft Tutorial:  https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B1FU8UEZRBsUTnZ3c1hjanVLcEU

This game is scheduled for soft release in Australia, New Zealand & Canada on 20 October 2017 on Android & iOS.
